revised_title: The Development and Classification of Protostigmata in Ascidians
tldr: The author investigates the development and classification of protostigmata in ascidians, revealing different methods by which a large number of stigmata are derived from a single pair. The study provides insight into the affinities of various forms and offers a comparison of early stages of development in different species. The author also discusses the factors involved in the process of stigmatogenesis and the importance of understanding the basis of this process in the study of Ascidian pharynx development.
